statements: SELECT id, strategy_name, risk_limit, max_exposure, timestamp FROM risk_parameters;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_limit, max_exposure FROM risk_parameters WHERE risk_limit > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM risk_parameters ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, max_exposure FROM risk_parameters WHERE strategy_name = 'Arbitrage';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM risk_parameters;
SELECT * FROM risk_parameters WHERE risk_limit > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, max_exposure FROM risk_parameters WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY max_exposure ASC;
SELECT id, strategy_name, risk_limit FROM risk_parameters WHERE max_exposure < 1000 AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_strategies FROM risk_parameters WHERE risk_limit = 0.75 AND strategy_name ILIKE '%long%';
SELECT DISTINCT strategy_name FROM risk_parameters WHERE risk_limit BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.6 AND max_exposure > 500 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_parameters;
SELECT strategy_name, max_loss FROM risk_parameters WHERE risk_level > 2;
SELECT strategy_name, max_exposure FROM risk_parameters ORDER BY max_exposure DESC;
SELECT id, strategy_name, risk_level FROM risk_parameters WHERE risk_level = 3;
SELECT strategy_name, max_order_size FROM execution_limits WHERE max_order_size >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM risk_parameters WHERE risk_level > 3 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, max_loss FROM risk_parameters WHERE max_loss > 1000;
SELECT strategy_name, max_loss, max_exposure FROM risk_parameters WHERE risk_level < 2 ORDER BY max_exposure DESC;
SELECT * FROM execution_limits WHERE time_window > '1 hour' ORDER BY max_orders_per_sec DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, max_order_size FROM execution_limits WHERE max_order_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM RiskParameters ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_limit FROM RiskParameters WHERE risk_threshold > 0.5;
SELECT id, strategy_name, risk_threshold FROM RiskParameters WHERE risk_limit < 0.1;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_limit, risk_threshold FROM RiskParameters WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM ExecutionStrategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_limit FROM RiskParameters ORDER BY risk_limit DESC
SELECT strategy_name, risk_threshold FROM RiskParameters WHERE strategy_name = 'High Risk Strategy'
SELECT * FROM ExecutionStrategies WHERE execution_type = 'Automated' AND execution_limit > 1000 ORDER BY execution_limit ASC
SELECT rp.strategy_name, rl.max_position_size FROM RiskParameters rp JOIN RiskLimits rl ON rp.id = rl.strategy_id WHERE rp.risk_limit > 0.5
SELECT es.strategy_name, rp.strategy_name FROM ExecutionStrategies es JOIN RiskParameters rp ON es.strategy_name = rp.strategy_name
SELECT * FROM RiskParameters ORDER BY parameter_name DESC, parameter_value ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_rule FROM ExecutionStrategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT parameter_name, MAX(parameter_value) FROM RiskParameters GROUP BY parameter_name;
SELECT * FROM StrategyLimits WHERE max_order_size > 100 AND max_position_size < 500;
SELECT strategy_id, COUNT(metric_id) AS metric_count FROM StrategyMetrics GROUP BY strategy_id HAVING metric_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM RiskParameters;
SELECT strategy_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM RiskParameters ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_rule FROM ExecutionStrategies WHERE execution_type = 'Manual';
SELECT max_position_size, max_order_size FROM StrategyLimits WHERE max_position_size > 1000;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM StrategyMetrics WHERE metric_value < 0.5 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_parameters;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM risk_parameters WHERE parameter_value > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, execution_time FROM strategy_execution ORDER BY execution_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM algorithmic_strategies WHERE strategy_description IS NOT NULL;

SELECT parameter_name, strategy_name FROM risk_parameters JOIN risk_strategy_mapping ON risk_parameters.parameter_id = risk_strategy_mapping.parameter_id JOIN algorithmic_strategies ON risk_strategy_mapping.strategy_id = algorithmic_strategies.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM risk_parameters;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM risk_parameters ORDER BY parameter_value DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, execution_time FROM strategy_execution WHERE execution_time > '2022-01-01';

SELECT rs.map_id, rp.parameter_name, a.strategy_name FROM risk_strategy_mapping rs INNER JOIN risk_parameters rp ON rs.parameter_id = rp.parameter_id INNER JOIN algorithmic_strategies a ON rs.strategy_id = a.strategy_id WHERE rp.parameter_value > 0.5;
SELECT sl.limit_name, sl.max_limit, sl.min_limit, as.strategy_description FROM strategy_limits sl LEFT JOIN algorithmic_strategies as ON sl.limit_id = as.strategy_id ORDER BY sl.max_limit DESC;
